snippet: Thousands more students who attended programs of Corinthian College, once one of the nation’s largest for-profit education companies, will now be included.
abstract: Education Dept announces plans to expand program to forgive federal student loan debt to thousands more students who attended programs of for-profit Corinthian Colleges.
lead_paragraph: Thousands more students who attended programs of Corinthian College, once one of the nation’s largest for-profit education companies, will now be included.

headline.main: Government to Expand Program to Forgive Student Loan Debt
headline.print_headline: Government to Expand Program to Forgive Student Loan Debt
